name: Country Harvest Soup
preparation: In a Round Steamer, add chopped potatoes, sliced carrots, marinara sauce mix, diced tomatoes, and spinach. Microwave on high for 6–8 min.
In a large stockpot, add water and Ramen Broth Mix. Heat until dissolved.
Add beans, lentils, pumpkin puree, and olive oil. Then, add potato and tomato mixture; cook over medium-high heat for an additional 10 min, until thoroughly heated. Enjoy!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Ramen Broth Mix
summary: Warming flavours of tamari and garlic, with a hint of smokiness. Just add water!

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
